nodes.description: 2016年3月27日巴基斯坦拉合尔Gulshan-e-Iqbal公园发生自杀式爆炸，造成70余人死亡
nodes.support_text: More than 70 have been reported killed in Lahore in a suicide bombing. More than 70 have been reported killed in Lahore, Pakistan, after an alleged suicide-bomb attack.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致29名儿童死亡，受害者包括穆斯林和基督徒
nodes.support_text: authorities counted 29 children among those killed by an Easter suicide bombing in an amusement park

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦宣布进入三天全国哀悼期，关闭学校和市场
nodes.support_text: the country started a three-day mourning period. schools and markets closed

nodes.description: 军方在旁遮普省五座城市展开突袭，逮捕恐怖分子并缴获大量武器
nodes.support_text: Security forces arrested a 'number of terrorist suspects and facilitators' in at least five separate raids

nodes.description: 梵蒂冈教皇谴责爆炸事件，呼吁保护少数族裔
nodes.support_text: Pope Francis on Monday decried the Easter bombing as 'vile and abominable' and called for Pakistan's religious minorities to be protected

nodes.description: 总理纳瓦兹·谢里夫取消华盛顿核峰会行程，前往拉合尔慰问伤者
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif arrived in Lahore... to visit the wounded

nodes.description: 极端组织Jamaat ul-Ahrar宣称对爆炸负责，称目标为庆祝复活节的基督徒
nodes.support_text: Jamaat ul-Ahrar claimed responsibility for the attack, saying, 'It was our people who attacked the Christians in Lahore, celebrating Easter'
